item.description:
Za is ever-pleasing comfort food for the foodie. It's relatively inexpensive, low-key, easy to park at (or take the bus to). Za and Sunday evenings just somehow go together.

"Za" stands for "Pizza", with innovation. You'll find all sorts of ingredients on your pizzas that you never guessed possible. If that scares you, don't worry, you can probably find something not too post-modern. Personally I love the "salads". They're mounds of curious ingredients that blend harmoniously, and you won't find them other places. My favorite is the Haas avocado & black bean & red onion, with its crunchy bits and much more. They offer high-quality if not exotic beer and wine.
item.name: Za
